application configuration properties

properties.label: DBname
properties.description: DB name to create

properties.label: DBusername
properties.description: DB username to create

properties.label: DBpassword
properties.description: DB password to create

properties.label: max_connections
properties.description: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.

properties.label: shared_buffers
properties.description: Sets the number of shared memory buffers used by the server.

properties.label: wal_buffers
properties.description: Sets the number of disk-page buffers in shared memory for WAL.

properties.label: work_mem
properties.description: Sets the maximum memory to be used for query workspaces.

properties.label: maintenance_work_mem
properties.description: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.

properties.label: effective_cache_size
properties.description: Sets the planner's assumption about the size of the disk cache.

properties.label: wal_keep_segments
properties.description: Sets the number of WAL files held for standby servers.

properties.label: checkpoint_timeout
properties.description: Sets the maximum time between automatic WAL checkpoints.

properties.label: autovacuum
properties.description: Starts the autovacuum subprocess.

properties.label: vacuum_cost_delay
properties.description: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds.

properties.label: autovacuum_naptime
properties.description: Time to sleep between autovacuum runs.

properties.label: vacuum_cost_limit
properties.description: Vacuum cost amount available before napping.

properties.label: bgwriter_delay
properties.description: Background writer sleep time between rounds.

properties.label: bgwriter_lru_multiplier
properties.description: Multiple of the average buffer usage to free per round.

properties.label: wal_level
properties.description: Set the level of information written to the WAL.

properties.label: wal_writer_delay
properties.description: Time between WAL flushes performed in the WAL writer.

properties.label: fsync
properties.description: Forces synchronization of updates to disk.

properties.label: commit_delay
properties.description: Sets the delay in microseconds between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk.

properties.label: commit_siblings
properties.description: Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

properties.label: enable_bitmapscan
properties.description: Enables the planner's use of bitmap-scan plans.

properties.label: enable_seqscan
properties.description: Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.

properties.label: full_page_writes
properties.description: Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint.

properties.label: log_min_messages
properties.description: Sets the message levels that are logged.

properties.label: deadlock_timeout
properties.description: Sets the time to wait on a lock before checking for deadlock.

properties.label: log_lock_waits
properties.description: Logs long lock waits.

properties.label: log_min_duration_statement
properties.description: Sets the minimum execution time above which statements will be logged.

properties.label: temp_buffers
properties.description: Sets the maximum number of temporary buffers used by each session.

properties.label: max_prepared_transactions
properties.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.

properties.label: max_wal_senders
properties.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running WAL sender processes.

properties.label: bgwriter_lru_maxpages
properties.description: Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round.

properties.label: synchronous_standby_names
properties.description: Number of synchronous standbys and list of names of potential synchronous ones.

properties.label: synchronous_commit
properties.description: Sets the current transaction's synchronization level.
